attributes.comment:
I am writing regarding the increase to the Adjustment of the Immigration and
Naturalization Benefit Application and Petition Fee Schedule. I am currently in the
process of adopting a daughter from China. I've already paid the immagration fee
and submitted all of my ppwk, but since the ppwk is only good for 18 months, I will
have to re-apply since we will probably not be home from China before our 171-H
expires. It seems we are being penalized for things that are out of our hands, and
this is already an emotional and expensive process as it is. If you are not going to
extend the 171-H time to 24 months, then for those who have already applied I
suggest a lower fee or renewal fee of $50 since we have already submitted and
been approved on our ppwk, so we don't have to be penalized by such a large fee
for our adoption. I don't think it's fair that we have to pay this fee twice and since
we already where approved once our submitions should be easily approved the
second time.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Karen Rainey
